Uses of Interface
org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection

    • Uses of IMCConnection in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc

      Methods in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc with parameters of type IMCConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IMC.batchEnding(IMCConnection c)
      The TNC Client calls this method to notify IMCs that all IMV messages received in a batch have been delivered and this is the IMC's last chance to send a message in the batch of IMC messages currently being collected.
      void IMC.beginHandshake(IMCConnection c)
      The TNC Client calls this method to indicate that an Integrity Check Handshake is beginning and solicit messages from IMCs for the first batch.
      void IMC.notifyConnectionChange(IMCConnection c, long newState)
      Informs the IMC that the state of the network connection identified by connection parameter has changed to a new state.
      void IMC.receiveMessage(IMCConnection c, long messageType, byte[] message)
      The TNC Client calls this method to deliver a message to the IMC.
      void IMCLong.receiveMessageLong(IMCConnection c, long messageFlags, long messageVendorID, long messageSubtype, byte[] message, long sourceIMVID, long destinationIMCID)
      The TNC Client calls this method (if supported by the TNCC and implemented by an IMC) to deliver a message to the IMC.
      void IMCSOH.receiveMessageSOH(IMCConnection c, long systemHealthID, byte[] sohrReportEntry)
      The TNC Client calls this method (if supported by the TNCC and implemented by an IMC) to deliver an SOHRReportEntry message to the IMC.
